snippet.title: On a Summer Night - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2347980/On_a_Summer_Night/

"Today, I would like to tell you about one night.
One night that changed my life."

Tokyo suburbs. Japan, early 2000's.
You're an overworked employee going home on a wet and hot summer night.
At the station, you discover that your bag is missing after you've been hit by... something unknown.
Lights are dim and weird people are roaming in the empty streets. How the hell are you supposed to get home now?

With anime-esque graphics and a dark sense of humor, On a Summer Night is the first commercial game of Team Wagashi.

Music Credits: 
"Midnight Stroll" by AK
"piano loop 220727" by Timouse
